item.title: 3.4.0-beta
item.description:
This is a beta version which probably has not been sufficiently tested.
  • Version 3.4.0 beta (508):
    • Fixed: Spectrum crashes when opening the Impact database query dialog.
    • Added anion version to the Water default line catalog.
    • Added anion version to the Water + Fe default template.
  • Version 3.4.0 beta (507):
    • Bug fixes.
  • Version 3.4.0 beta (506):
    • Bug fixes.
  • Version 3.4.0 beta (505):
    • New About Spectrum window.
    • New What's New window.
    • Marks the event that is currently selected in the statistics scatter plots.
    • Enhanced the capabilities of the Collection Efficiency statistics tool.
    • Reads projects created with older versions (<2.2) of Spectrum App.
    • Performance improvements and bug fixes.
  • Version 3.4.0 beta (503):
    • Bug fixes.
  • Version 3.4.0 beta (502):
    • The internal data handling has been rewritten, which significantly improves the memory footprint and the performance of the user interface.
    • Ringing imposed on a line profile can now be fitted to a damped oscillator model to remove it from the waveform.
    • Projects that were saved with older versions of the app (< 2.2) can now be opened again.
    • Added a filter to down select mass spectra with a line whose estimated abundance is within a specified range.
    • Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
